page.title: 11Holiday Camp - Paignton
page.content: We came into the camp and went to the Reception. They gave us badges, brochures and stickers. We went to the children's playground then to the ballroom to see the Donkey Derby. {The Chef} Then we went to see the Chef he told us that there are 760 people fed at each sitting. There are three meals per day and each meal offer a choice of three or four courses. The menu is changed every day and the chef has 22 helpers. The drinks are tea, coffee and fruit juice. The chef has to work 39 hours and has to wear a chef's uniform all the time. He does not have time off between meals but he enjoys his work.
